resources.string:
In order to make the most out of the App Philips requires your consent to collect and use information about your child’s usage of Philips Sonicare and the App.

This information will include brushing time, period and frequency collected from the brush handle and the App.

This information allows you to monitor and encourage your child’s brushing habits and to receive personalized brushing information and notifications when it is time to replace your brush head.

We will not collect or use any personal information from the child if you do not provide such consent.
If you agree, you will receive a confirmatory consent request when you enter the parental section again after a minimum period of 24 hours from now.\n\n

Thank you for consenting to the storage of your child’s information.This is a second consent to confirm your approval.

In order to make the most out of the app please confirm your parental consent to allow Philips to collect and use information about your child’s usage of the Philips Sonicare and the App. This information will include brushing time, period and frequency collected from the brush handle and the App.

This information allows you to monitor and encourage your child’s brushing habits and to receive personalized brushing information and notifications when it is time to replace your brush head.

We will not collect or use any personal information from the child if you do not provide such consent.

Koninklijke Philips N.V. and its subsidiaries (\"Philips\") believe strongly in protecting the privacy of the data you share with us. We also believe it is important to inform you about how we will use your data, and to give you choices about how those data will be used. Therefore, we encourage you to read this Privacy Notice carefully, before you make your choices and give us the right to use your information. This is a notice about Philips’ privacy practices, not a contact or agreement.
This is intended for people above %d. Please ask your parent to do it for you.
The provided age does not match with year of birth. Please make sure your age and year of birth are correct.

Thank you for caring and sharing!
Thank you for your parential consent
You have given your consent to Philips to collect information about brushing time, period and frequency collected from the brush handle and the App
Philips takes your privacy and personal data very seriously. We will never use this data for any other purposes than improving the Sonicare for Kids experience
You will receive a confirmatory consent request when you enter the parental section again after a minimum period of 24 hours from now.
Read the privacy notice for more information.
Your parental consent already given to Philips to collect and use certain information from the Philips Sonicare Kids App.
Philips takes the utmost care to protect your privacy. To make sure it was really you, please reconfirm.
No, Thanks. I changed my mind.
